title: Workarounds to Add Collaborators After Publishing

steps.title: Ask the collaborator to repost to their feed.
steps.content: Ask the collaborator to repost to their feed. So your post mimics a collab post that's shared to both collaborator's feeds, ask the other collaborator(s) to repost the "collab" post to their page . This way, you won't miss out on the larger audience benefit of collab posts.

steps.title: Tag the collaborator in the post or caption.
steps.content: Tag the collaborator in the post or caption. Even though you didn't add the other person as a collaborator, you can edit the post to include their name . Since you're tagging the other person , that post is likely to show up for fans of that other creator, which increases your reach.

steps.title: Ask the collaborator(s) to share the post on their Story.
steps.content: Ask the collaborator(s) to share the post on their Story. In addition to doing everything else, you also want them to share your post to their Story so you can increase your reach. Their full audience might not see the Feed post, but will more likely see the Story!

steps.title: Delete the post and create it again.
steps.content: Delete the post and create it again. If you want to create a collab post, you'll have to delete the post you published without adding collaborators and add them to the new post before hitting Publish . To create a joint post , you simply need to tap Add People before you publish the post. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Why won't Instagram let me add a collaborator?
steps.content: Why won't Instagram let me add a collaborator? Make sure your account is set to public or that your collaborator is also public. Private accounts are unable to receive collaboration requests.

steps.title: How do I add collaborators to collections?
steps.content: How do I add collaborators to collections? Tap the bookmark icon beneath a post on Instagram, then tap New Collection . Add that collection's name, then tap the toggle next to "Allow friends to join this collection . Next, search for their username to add them, then tap Save . You can add up to 250 people in a collection. [2] X Research source

steps.title: How can I post jointly with a private account?
steps.content: How can I post jointly with a private account? If a private account creates a collab, only accepted followers can be invited as collaborators.

steps.title: Do you get paid to collab on Instagram?
steps.content: Do you get paid to collab on Instagram? You can make money with paid collab posts, but not every collab post on Instagram is paid for.

steps.title: How many people can you add as collaborators on Instagram?
steps.content: How many people can you add as collaborators on Instagram? You can add up to 20 people as collaborators to a post on Instagram. If you want to add more than 20 people, use the workarounds in this article.
